heading: ***FREEZE WARNINGS TONIGHT***Today
text: A few clouds early, giving way to sunshine. Quite cool. Highs in the upper 40s to mid 50s. Winds north to northwest 10 to 15 mph, decreasing through the afternoon.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly clear and cold. Widespread frost and freezing temperatures. Lows in the mid 20s to low 30s, near 20 in the cold spots. Winds northwest near 10 mph in the evening, diminishing to light and variable.

heading: Friday
text: Mostly sunny and still cool. Highs in the upper 50s to low 60s. Winds light, becoming southwest near 10 mph, some gusts to 20 mph through the Champlain Valley and over the higher terrain.
